titles.title: A bill to modify the definition of "antique firearm".
A bill to modify the definition of "antique firearm".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Modifies the definition of "antique firearm" under the federal criminal code and the Internal Revenue Code to cover any firearm manufactured in or before the calendar year that is 100 years before the year in which a determination is made as to whether the firearm is an antique firearm (currently, any firearm manufactured in or before 1898).
